Start creating what clients truly need in your field. Once you register as an Insighter, you'll receive notifications about client requests, enabling you to produce relevant data, reports, and insights from your area of expertise.

Work Anytime, Anywhere

dataTypeSection.title: What data, insights, reports, or expertise have you locked away?
dataTypeSection.description: Insighta is your platform to showcase and monetize your intellectual assets. The platform organizes all your published material‚Äîincluding data and insights by category, making it easy for global audiences to find and purchase your work.

insighter.title: What is an
insighter.point1: A subject matter expert, practitioner, consultant, strategist, technician, or field professional with hands-on experience,
insighter.point2: who shares valuable data, reports, insights, case studies, or practical tools on Insighta platform to empower others and help businesses grow;
insighter.point3: A insight contributor who earns income each time their expertise is accessed.

aboutUsPage.firstParagraph: Insighta is a pioneering digital platform that provides individuals and businesses with access to high-quality business insights, such as data, reports, statistics, and manuals across various industries. Our mission is to facilitate seamless insight sharing by offering a structured and accessible marketplace for expert-driven content.
aboutUsPage.firstParagraphPartTwo: Whether you're a professional seeking a valuable insight or an industry expert looking to monetize your expertise, Insighta is your gateway to trusted insights.
aboutUsPage.ourVisionPart1: At Insighta, we envision a world where expertise is easily accessible, enabling businesses and professionals to make informed decisions with confidence.
aboutUsPage.ourVisionPart2: We aim to bridge the gap between insight seekers and insight creators
aboutUsPage.ourVisionPart3: , fostering a dynamic ecosystem of learning and growth.
aboutUsPage.whatOffer1P: ‚Äì Users can browse and access a variety of insight types, including reports, data sets, statistics, and manuals. Insight files are available for both personal and business use, with some being free and others available for purchase. Additionally, users can buy full reports or specific sections, such as individual chapters or particular datasets, on a pay-as-you-go basis.
aboutUsPage.whatOffer2P: ‚Äì Users can connect directly with insight experts for additional insights related to a particular uploaded file. They can also book consultation sessions with experts for deeper discussions and personalized guidance.
aboutUsPage.whatOffer3P: ‚Äì Insighta features an advanced AI-supported search engine that enhances discoverability and accessibility of insights, making it easier for users to find relevant information. Our data is structured based on international standards such as ISIC and HS Codes, ensuring seamless integration into global business frameworks.
aboutUsPage.whatOffer4P: ‚Äì Subject matter experts, consultants, and analysts can publish and sell their data, report and statistics, earning revenue from their knowledge contributions.
aboutUsPage.whatOffer5P: ‚Äì Experts on Insighta can be individual professionals or companies. The platform supports company creation, allowing company owners to invite experts‚Äîboth from within the platform and external professionals‚Äîto contribute knowledge, upload insights, and sell data and reports.
aboutUsPage.whatOffer6P: ‚Äì Serving professionals and businesses worldwide, with a focus on the EU, GCC region, U.S., and Jordan.
aboutUsPage.benefitKnoldgp1: ‚Äì Gain access to industry reports, market research, and expert analyses and statistics.
aboutUsPage.benefitKnoldgp2: ‚Äì Share your expertise, grow your audience, and earn from your Business insights.
aboutUsPage.benefitKnoldgp3: ‚Äì Distribute valuable insights to a wider professional audience.
aboutUsPage.benefitKnoldgp4: ‚Äì Utilize expert insights for informed policymaking and economic development.
aboutUsPage.parentCompanyParagraph: Insighta is proudly owned and operated by A&B Consulting, a firm dedicated to driving business success through strategic insights and sustainable solutions. With a strong foundation in consulting and research, A&B Consulting ensures that Insighta remains a trusted and professional platform for knowledge exchange.

Resources.user-guide-description: Welcome to the Insighta User Guide. Here you'll find everything you need to know about using our platform.
Resources.user-guide-welcome-message: This guide will help you navigate through all the features and functionalities of Insighta platform.
Resources.user-guide-navigation-instruction: Use the sidebar navigation to find specific topics you're interested in.
Resources.user-guide-help-instruction: If you can't find what you're looking for, don't hesitate to contact our support team.
Resources.getting-started-description: Learn the basics of using Insighta platform and start your journey.
Resources.create-account-step: Create an account or sign in to your existing account
Resources.complete-profile-step: Complete your profile with relevant information
Resources.explore-content-step: Start exploring content from the home page
Resources.save-content-step: Save interesting content for later reference
Resources.next-steps-description: After getting familiar with the basics, continue exploring:
Resources.account-management-next: Learn more about account management options
Resources.search-tips-next: Check out search tips to find exactly what you need

ProfilePage.payWithCard: Pay with credit or debit card
ProfilePage.paymentVerificationFailed: Payment verification failed. Please contact support.

termsAndConditions.welcomeKnoldg: Welcome to Insighta Business, an online platform providing access to expert insights, reports, and data. By accessing or using our Platform, you agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, please refrain from using Insighta Business.
termsAndConditions.authorizedUsers: Authorized Users: Individuals or organizations registered and granted access based on their account type.
termsAndConditions.expertContributors: Expert Contributors: Individuals or entities uploading reports, insights, or data for sale or free display.
termsAndConditions.subscribersPurchasers: Subscribers and Buyers: Users purchasing or subscribing to access reports, insights, or related materials.
termsAndConditions.freeUsers: Free Users ‚Äì may browse and download limited public content.
termsAndConditions.payYou: Pay-per-use Users ‚Äì purchase individual insights or reports.
termsAndConditions.subscribers: Subscribers ‚Äì enjoy tiered subscription packages with broader access.
termsAndConditions.expertContributors2: Expert Contributors ‚Äì upload and sell content under a Data Licensing Agreement.
termsAndConditions.UsersPurchaseReports: Reports may be bought individually or through subscription tiers.
termsAndConditions.payYou2: Purchased content is for internal or personal use only. Redistribution or resale is prohibited.
termsAndConditions.subscription: Each report may carry usage restrictions or expiry conditions set by the contributor.
termsAndConditions.purchasedreports: All content, code, and trademarks belong to Insighta Business or its contributors.
termsAndConditions.reportsRestrictions: Users may not copy or distribute content without written consent.
termsAndConditions.knoldgCuratesRich: These Terms are to be read together with the <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>, <cookies>Cookies Policy</cookies>, and <licensing>Data Licensing Agreement</licensing>.
termsAndConditions.Usersaccurate: Users must provide accurate registration information.
termsAndConditions.Usersresponsible: Users are responsible for safeguarding login credentials.
termsAndConditions.Knoldgnotified: Any unauthorized activity must be reported immediately to privacy@insightabusiness.com.
termsAndConditions.Acceptedpayment: Payments accepted via credit card, PayPal, bank transfer, or regional options.
termsAndConditions.RefundsNotAllowed: Refunds are only allowed in cases of duplicate charges or technical errors.
termsAndConditions.KnoldgRight: Insighta Business may update or discontinue features without prior notice.
termsAndConditions.Usersnotified: Significant changes affecting access or pricing will be communicated to users.
termsAndConditions.ServicesMaterials: Services and materials are provided ‚Äúas is.‚Äù
termsAndConditions.Knoldgliable: Insighta Business is not liable for business decisions made based on purchased information.
termsAndConditions.Liabilitycapped: Liability is limited to the amount paid for the specific disputed service.
termsAndConditions.ForEU: EU Users: GDPR and EU consumer protection laws apply.
termsAndConditions.ForUS: US Users: CCPA and applicable state privacy laws apply.
termsAndConditions.ForJordan: Jordan & GCC Users: Local e-commerce and data protection laws apply.
termsAndConditions.Jordanianlaw: All disputes shall be governed by Jordanian law and settled by arbitration or competent courts in Amman.

privacyPage.Knoldgcollects: We collect personal information such as account details, browsing behavior, and purchase records to improve user experience.
privacyPage.LegitimateInterests: Legitimate interests (e.g., fraud prevention and service improvement)
privacyPage.PersonalData: We do not sell personal data.
privacyPage.DataShared: Data may be shared with payment processors or anti-fraud providers.
privacyPage.InformationDisclosed: If transferred outside the EU, we apply Standard Contractual Clauses or equivalent safeguards.
privacyPage.UsersCookie: Continued use of the platform after changes constitutes acceptance.
privacyPage.UsersHave: You may request access, correction, deletion, portability, or withdrawal of consent at any time via privacy@insightabusiness.com.
privacyPage.Knoldgemploys: We employ encryption, secure access controls, and regular monitoring to protect personal data.
privacyPage.PersonalData2: Personal data is retained only as long as necessary for service delivery or legal compliance.

dataLicenseAgreement.scopeLine1: Contributors grant Insighta Business a non-exclusive, worldwide license to:
dataLicenseAgreement.scopeLine2: Distribute and sell content and insights
dataLicenseAgreement.scopeLine4: Analyze content for internal improvement and AI-based analytics
dataLicenseAgreement.paymentsLine1: Contributors earn commissions from each sale. Payouts occur within three months of each transaction.
dataLicenseAgreement.paymentsLine2: Contributors are responsible for local tax compliance.
dataLicenseAgreement.ipLine1: Contributors must own the IP rights for their content. Insighta Business may remove content violating IP laws.
dataLicenseAgreement.ipLine2: Insighta Business reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to remove any content it considers inconsistent with the Terms of Use, the objectives of the Platform, its policies, or applicable professional standards.
dataLicenseAgreement.liabilityLine1: Contributors bear responsibility for the accuracy and legality of their content and agree to indemnify Insighta Business against claims arising from inaccurate or misleading material.
dataLicenseAgreement.terminationLine1: Contributors may request content removal; prior licenses and completed sales remain valid.
dataLicenseAgreement.terminationLine2: Insighta Business may terminate agreements for policy breaches.
dataLicenseAgreement.applicableLawText: Governed by Jordanian law and subject to arbitration in Amman.

cookiesPolicy.consentTitle: This policy explains how Insighta Business uses cookies and similar technologies.
cookiesPolicy.consentLine2: On your first visit, you‚Äôll see a notice requesting your consent for optional cookies. You may withdraw consent anytime via browser settings.
cookiesPolicy.authLine1: Our platform primarily uses local Storage for authentication to improve stability and reduce login issues.
cookiesPolicy.cookieDurationLine1: Session cookies expire when you leave the site; analytical cookies last up to 12 months.
cookiesPolicy.thirdPartyLine1: We use tools such as Google Analytics and Meta Pixel under their respective privacy policies.
cookiesPolicy.manageLine1: You may disable cookies in your browser; doing so may affect certain platform functions.
cookiesPolicy.relationLine1: This document complements the Privacy Policy and Terms of Service.
cookiesPolicy.relationLineRich: This document complements the <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy> and <terms>Terms of Service</terms>.
